description:
Job Title - Inventory Control Specialist (ICQA)

Location - Los Angeles, CA

Full time

Salary - $85k - $98k benefits + Bonus

Bilingual - Fluent in English and Mandarin - "Proficiency in Mandarin is preferred as the successful candidate will be required to communicate with business partners in China."

Job description:

Key Skills : Quality management within the warehouse setting, training, inventory variance analysis, internal quality improvement project, etc

  • Successful candidates for the role of Inventory Control QA associate possess a combination of strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and excellent problem-solving abilities.
  • They have a keen eye for spotting discrepancies and are adept at conducting thorough investigations to identify the root causes.
  • Proficiency in utilizing inventory management systems and software is essential, as these tools play a crucial role in recording and tracking inventory data accurately.
  • Effective communication skills are paramount in this role, as Inventory Control QA associates need to collaborate with cross-functional teams to resolve issues.
  • Must be able to clearly communicate their findings, propose solutions, and work together with others to implement necessary changes.
  • Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines is also important, as inventory management requires swift action to prevent disruptions in the supply chain.
